summary: Changes the Hall of Attainment in the College of Winterhold. Adds signs for rooms, doors for privacy increased lighting so you can actually see stuff and more...
descriptionHtml:
[size=48][u][b]/Description/[/b][/u][/size]
Changes the Hall of Attainment in the College of Winterhold. Adds signs for rooms, doors for privacy increased lighting so you can actually see stuff and more...
This is my second mod so please go easy and is a rework of my previous mod which did a similar thing. I mostly just made this mod for myself and to learn how to texture and make new models.

[size=48][u][b]/Change Log/[/b][/u][/size]
1.0 - Initial Release

[size=48][u][b]/Future Ideas/[/b][/u][/size]
[b]Any more ideas will be greatly appreciated.[/b]
[ul]
[li]Adding bookshelves and a small library.[/li]
[li]Change the other rooms[/li]
[/ul]
author: SpamBrie
